home.name: MMeowhite
home.profile: Hello! I'm Baimiaomiao, a researcher and educator at Sichuan University. My expertise lies in medicine, bioinformatics, mathematics, and physics, with a focus on leveraging computational techniques to solve biomedical challenges. Passionate about interdisciplinary research, I aim to bridge the gap between technology and healthcare to drive innovation. Welcome to my website, where I share my work, ideas, and ongoing projects. Let's connect and explore new possibilities together!Hello! I'm Baimiaomiao, a researcher and educator at Sichuan University. home.quote: What hinders learning is absolutely not the difficulty of the knowledge itself, but the unreasonable design of the learning gradient and the lack of prerequisite knowledge.

education.major: Bachelor of Medicine in Medical Imaging (Radiology and Diagnostic Technology)
Master of Medicine in Basic Medicine (Chemistry and Molecular Biology)

location.name: The Beibei Affiliated Hospital of Chongqing Medical University
The Second Affiliated Hospital of Chongqing Medical University
The University-Town Affiliated Hospital of Chongqing Medical University
Institute Brain Science and Disease of Chongqing Medical University
West China school of Basic Medical Sciences & Forensic Medicine of Sichuan University
State Key Laboratory of Biotherapy of Sichuan University / Frontiers Medical Center, Tianfu Jincheng Laboratory

Bioinformatics: RNA-Seq quality control and data preprocessing: Trimming, Filtering, Alignment (STAR, HISAT2)
Variant calling and annotation: SNPs, Indels, CNVs
Bulk RNA-seq: Differential gene expression analysis, Alternative splicing analysis, GO/KEGG/GSEA enrichment analysis
Single-cell RNA-Seq analysis (scRNA-Seq): Seurat V5, Monocle, Scanpy, Celltree
Visualization of omics data: Heatmaps, Volcano plots, PCA, t-SNE, UMAP, Circos plots
Multi-omics data integration analysis: WGS, WES, GWAS, RNA-Seq, ChIP-Seq, ATAC-seq, Metabolomics, Proteomics
Machine learning in bioinformatics: Predictive models, Clustering algorithms (K-means, Hierarchical)
Framework and libraries.Web development: Full stack development: React, Bootstrap, Flask, Node.js

list.Clinical Skills: History taking, Physical Examination, Vital Signs Monitoring, Emergency Skills etc.
